snippet: In an unusual move, same-sex marriage advocates fresh off a legal victory in Utah are supporting efforts to ask the Supreme Court to weigh in.
abstract: Lawyers for three couples challenging Utah's ban on same-sex marriage say that they will join with their opponents to urge Supreme Court to hear their case, even though they won appeals court ruling striking down the law; unusual move could hasten final ruling from Supreme Court on same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: In an unusual move, same-sex marriage advocates fresh off a legal victory in Utah are supporting efforts to ask the Supreme Court to weigh in.

headline.main: Both Sides in Gay Marriage Fight in Utah Agree: Supreme Court Should Hear Case
headline.print_headline: Both Sides in Gay Marriage Fight in Utah Agree: Supreme Court Should Hear Case

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
